description:
A compact, efficient panel to keep your USB powered devices going anywhere under the sun. Equipped with a standard USB port, it works with any USB-powered device and many Goal Zero powerbanks.

  • Charges most USB powered devices, USB port: 5V, up to 2.1A (10.5W max)
  • Blue (8mm male) solar plug: 14 - 22V, up to 1.3A (20W max), lets you chain multiple panels
  • Works with Goal Zero Flip, Sherpa, Guide, Venture and Yeti series powerbanks
  • Charge times range from 4-8 hours for a Flip 36 (3.6V, 10,050mAh battery) to 11-22 hours for a Yeti 200X (14.4V, 187Wh battery)
  • Kickstand helps you find the perfect angle for optimal solar power
  • Unfolded dimensions: 29 x 55 x 2 cm
  • Monocrystalline panel rated at 20W
name: Goal Zero Nomad 20 Solar Panel
